```{r}
library(ggplot2)
meanMTdf <- read.csv("/Users/georgios/Documents/GitHub/SMPE2024GeorgiosPublic/Lecture3(17Oct)/MYm2r_pointingxp/MYdata/MYMeanMT.csv")
rawdf <- read.csv("/Users/georgios/Documents/GitHub/SMPE2024GeorgiosPublic/Lecture3(17Oct)/MYm2r_pointingxp/MYdata/MYRawData.csv")
```

```{r}
ggplot(meanMTdf, aes(ID, MT)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method='lm')
```

```{r linear modeling}
model <- lm(MT~ID, data = meanMTdf)
summary(model)
```
Repeat data analysis using rawdata instead of meandata
```{r}
ggplot(rawdf, aes(ID, MT)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method='lm')
```

```{r linear modeling}
model <- lm(MT~ID, data = rawdf)
summary(model)
```
